channel.title: yahoo on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in yahoo on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-13
item.description: Jim Lanzone breaks up with Tinder, swipes right to take the CEO job at Yahoo, Renate Nyborg takes Tinder CEO role (3 minute read) Jim Lanzone, the current CEO of Tinder, has been appointed the new CEO for Yahoo under Apollo Global.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-04
item.description: Apple is reportedly working on a foldable iPhone for 2023 (2 minute read) Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo says that Apple plans to launch an 8-inch foldable iPhone by 2023.
